posts.post_content:
@A3Kitsune: You're right about [Koth of the Hammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Koth of the Hammer) having an Emblem ability, but so does [Venser, the Sojourner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Venser, the Sojourner). Venser's Emblem ability states "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."   
  
@Lutorius: Yes, [Elspeth, Knight-Errant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elspeth, Knight-Errant) will be legal in Extended for quite some time. Although she's still legal in Standard until October since Scars hasn't been released yet, when that happens, Alara block rotates out so the only way you'd be able to use her in Standard is if you pull an [Elspeth Tirel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elspeth Tirel).
posts.html:
@A3Kitsune: You're right about Koth of the Hammer having an Emblem ability, but so does Venser, the Sojourner. Venser's Emblem ability states "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

@Lutorius: Yes, Elspeth, Knight-Errant will be legal in Extended for quite some time. Although she's still legal in Standard until October since Scars hasn't been released yet, when that happens, Alara block rotates out so the only way you'd be able to use her in Standard is if you pull an Elspeth Tirel.

Posted By: Keiya (9/9/2010 8:18:52 PM)
Rating:

The art is nice, but seems to lack detail. Her armour, particularly her shoulder guards, look like they're made of styrofoam. And the card is ridiculously shiny. It's a little surreal.

That being said, I love the cloak and her stance. I'm glad I bought one of the duel decks. It's like I actually paid 25 dollars for an Elspeth, and they threw in a Tezzeret and a bunch of other cards.

@Richard_Hawk A poor man's Tirel? Are you out of your mind? Even this version is $17.50. A foil Shards one is 50. I wouldn't say that this version is inferior to Tirel, either.
